Title: Ashes to Ashes
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Christopher Hollier, Diane Ademu-John, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
